pullrequest.title: Show and Revoke permissions in User Metrics

content.raw: I'm going to change the names to include `Permission` in them, so it's more clear. The only problem I see is the `on-permissionsupdated` method, which has a misleading name: This method is called when we do `this.$.grant.getAll()`. By taking a look at the `gz-grant` element, this is indeed fired by a GET request on `/permissions`. Should I change the callback method name to `_onGetAllPermissions`, despite not being consistent with the name `on-permissionsupdated`?
content.html: I'm going to change the names to include Permission in them, so it's more clear. The only problem I see is the on-permissionsupdated method, which has a misleading name: This method is called when we do this.$.grant.getAll(). By taking a look at the gz-grant element, this is indeed fired by a GET request on /permissions. Should I change the callback method name to _onGetAllPermissions, despite not being consistent with the name on-permissionsupdated?
